Translations.Text: avanu (allahanu) helidanu; bahala alpavadhiyalle avaru paritapisaliddare
konege n'yaya prakara ondu hathat sphotavu avarannu avarisikonditu. Mattu navu avarannu kevala kasagalagisibittevu. Akrami janangagalige vinasa kadide
munde, avara balika navu itara piligegalannu srstisidevu
yavude samudayavu tanna nirdista avadhiginta munce horatu hodaddu illa. A balika ulidaddu illa

taruvaya navu bennu bennige nam'ma dutarannu kalisidevu. Pratiyondu samudayadavaru tam'ma balige tam'ma dutanu bandaga atanannu tiraskarisidaru. Navu avarannu obbara hinde innobbarante nillisidevu mattu navu avarellarannu kevala kategalagi marpadisi bittevu. (Satyavannu) nambada janangagalige vinasa kadide
munde navu musa mattu avara sahodara harunarannu nam'ma vacanagalondige hagu spasta puravegalondige kalisidevu –
– phir‌aun mattu avana adhikarigala kadege. Adare avaru doddastike toridaru. Avaru maha ahankarigalagiddaru
avaru helidaru; navenu, nam'mantaha ibbaru vyaktigalannu nambabeke? Avara janangadavarantu nam'ma dasaragiddare
avaru avaribbarannu tiraskarisidaru. Konege avarannu nasa madalayitu
nijavagi, a janaru saridariyannu kanalendu navu, musarige granthavannu nididdevu
Munde, navu maryamara putra (isa)rannu hagu avara (isara) mateyannu (maryamarannu) puraveyagisidevu mattu navu cilumegalidda ettarada neleyondaralli avarige asraya nididevu
dutare, sud'dhavadudanne tinniri mattu satkarmagalannu madiri. Nivu maduttiruva ellavannu nanu khandita ballenu
khandivagiyu i nim'ma (manava) samudayavu onde samudayavagide mattu nane nim'ma odeyanu. Nivu nanage anjiri
taruvaya avaru tam'ma naduve tam'ma dharmavannu chidragolisi bittaru. Pratiyondu gumpinavaru tam'ma bali enideyo adaralle santustaragiddare
ondu nirdista samayada tanaka nivu avarannu avarade bhrameyalliralu bittu bidiri
sampattu mattu santanagala mulaka navu avarige niduttiruva neravina kuritu avaru enendu bhavisiddare
avarige hitavannu madalu navu aturapaduttiddevende? Nijavagi avarige arivilla
avaru (hitakke ar'haradavaru) tam'ma odeyana bhayadinda sada vinamraragiruttare
mattu avaru tam'ma odeyana vacanagalannu nambuttare
avaru tam'ma odeyana jote yarannu palugolisuvudilla
avaru (danavagi) tavu koduvudannu koduttale iruttare mattu istagiyu tavu tam'ma odeyana kadege maralalikkide endu avara manas'sugalu anjuttiruttave
avare, satkaryagalannu madalu atura paduvavaru mattu avugaledege spardhatmakavagi dhavisi hoguvavaru
navantu yava jivada melu adara samarthyakkinta heccina honeyannu horisuvudilla mattu satyavannu matra heluva ondu granthavu nam'ma bali ide. (Addarinda) avara mele svalpavu an'yayavagadu
nijavagi, avara (dhikkarigala) manas'sugalu i (satyada) kuritu nirasaktavagive. Idallade avaru innu halavu (dusta) krtyagalannu maduttiddare
Konege, navu avarallina sampanna janarannu hididu siksisidaga avaru more idalarambhisuvaru
(aga avarodane helalaguvudu;) indu nivu more idabedi. Nam'ma kadeyinda nimage khandita yava neravu sigadu
nam'ma vacanagalannu nimage odi kelisalaguttittu. Aga nivu bennu tirugisi horatu biduttiddiri
a kuritu nivu ahankara toruttiddiri mattu (sullu) kategalannu katti tira ketta matugalannu aduttiddiri
avarenu i sandesada kuritu cintane nadesuvudillave? Athava avara purvajara balige bandiradidda enadaru avara balige bandideye
athava avarenu tam'ma devadutanannu gurutisada karana atanannu tiraskarisuttiruvare
athava, atanige huccu hididide endu avaru heluttiddareye? Nijavagi avaru (dutaru) satyadondige avara balige bandiddare. Adare avaralli heccinavaru satyavannu dvesisuttare

ondu vele satyavu avara apeksegalige vidheyavagiddare, akasagalu bhumiyu, avugalalli iruva ellaru vinasakke tuttagi biduttiddaru. Nijavagi, navu avara balige avarigagiye iruva upadesavannu tandiruvevu. Adare avaru tamagagiye iruva upadesavannu kadeganisuttiddare
(dutare,) nivenu avarodane enadaru pavatiyannu keluttira? Nim'ma odeyana vetanave nim'ma palige uttamavagide mattu avanu atyuttama annadatanagiddane
nivu avarannu sariyada dariya kadege kareyuttiruviri
paralokadalli nambike illadavaru khanditavagiyu nera margadinda duraviddare
navu avara mele karune toridare mattu avara sankatavannu nivarisidare avaru tam'ma vidroha dhoraneyalli mattastu sthiragolluvaru mattu (satyadinda, innastu dura) aledaduvaru
navu siksisuvudakkagi avarannu hidiyuvavaregu avaru vinaya toralilla mattu tam'ma odeyaneduru bhakti bhavavannu prakatisalilla
Konege navu avara palige nam'ma kathinasikseya bagilannu teredu bittaga avaru nirasaragi biduvaru
avane, nimagagi kivigalannu kannugalannu manas'sugalannu nirmisidavanu. Adare nivu krtajnate sallisuvudu tira kadime
